changeSet.author: kcando
changeSet.sql:
IF EXISTS (SELECT * FROM dbo.sysobjects WHERE id = object_id(N'dbo.move_building_inventory_item') AND OBJECTPROPERTY(id, N'IsProcedure') = 1) DROP PROCEDURE dbo.move_building_inventory_item GO
CREATE PROCEDURE dbo.move_building_inventory_item @item_id dbo.id_t, @slot_id TINYINT AS SET NOCOUNT ON
UPDATE dbo.Building_Inventories SET slot_id = @slot_id WHERE item_id = @item_id
SET NOCOUNT OFF
changeSet.rollback: IF EXISTS (SELECT * FROM dbo.sysobjects WHERE id = object_id(N'dbo.move_building_inventory_item') AND OBJECTPROPERTY(id, N'IsProcedure') = 1) DROP PROCEDURE dbo.move_building_inventory_item GO
